Question: Gwanak Analog Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Gwanak Analog Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

 - Analog-Power SoC
 - Sensor Signal Conditioning ICs
 - Specialization in intelligent analog and power chips
 - Applications in Industrial, Measurement, and Automotive sectors
 - High-Precision and High-Efficiency Analog-Front-End
 - Edge-AI System IC with patent-protected technologies
 - Tiny Deep Neural-Network Accelerator
 - Application-optimized AI Algorithm
 - High-quality sound and voice solutions
 - TTS (Text-to-Speech) Single-Chip solution
